review: I actually got to the point where I enjoyed the interface on this device, and had 2-3 days of really pleasant viewing experience.Now, my device will no longer connect to my wifi connection. Or it will connect and then say "authentication problem". Not sure why it just up and quit working after a few days. All other devices, including Apple TV, still connect perfectly.I bought this to be able to stream Prime video, so I'm pretty disappointed. Hoping for some sort of technical solution in the near future. Until then, I would NOT recommend purchasing this item.
author: Mary K. Baynor
